Eric Fleming https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Fleming 0 Eric Fleming (born Edward Heddy Jr.; July 4, 1925 – September 28, 1966) was an American actor and writer, known primarily for his role as Gil Favor in the CBS television series Rawhide. Eric_Fleming ( born Edward_Heddy_Jr. ; July_4_,_1925 – September_28_,_1966 ) was an_American_actor_and_writer , known primarily for his_role as Gil_Favor in the_CBS_television_series_Rawhide .
